io.sarl.lang.core

Interface EventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable

    public interface EventListener
extends Identifiable
    Entity capable listening to events inside an Interaction Space. Spaces in SARL are event driven. Most of the time, EventListeners in a Space will be Agents. However, any entity implementing the EventListener can interact inside an EventSpace (e.g. UI)
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: srodriguez$
